extension.name: Email Newsletter Manager
extension.description: Powerful email newsletters from within Symphony.

releases.release: - Also log the recipient address when sending fails - Improve description and add tests for extension prerequisites
- Fix typo
- Sanitize names for HTML output (prevents invalid HTML in the Symphony backend)
- Fix nasty regression
- Honor "Ignore attachment errors" option of ETM 7.4.0 (requires Symphony 2.7.0)
- Add delegates at start and end of newsletter - Bugfix: Make recipient sources process params if no dependencies exist (#76) - Several small fixes
- Bugfix: Use HELO hostname when sending (#75)
- Add new output modes (reduced/minimal) for faster datasource output
- Fix retrieval of Member ID as "author ID" - Replace deprecated globals with class constants - Add php-min/php-max info
- Fix incompatible function signature (#73)
- PHP7 compatibility - Fix for MySQL 5.7 strict mode - Cleanup
- Make ENM work with ETM attachments; requires ETM 7.3.0+
- Bugfixes (#69, #70)
- Replace deprecated delegate and extended class - Fix constants changed in Symphony 2.4
- Major cleanup (coding style, whitespace etc.)
- Full Symphony 2.6 compatibility - Fixed custom errors - Fixed recipients previews (especially email address validation)
- Update to support Symphony 2.6.x - Support for custom admin url
- Fixed XSRF filter issues on save.
- Symphony 2.4 compatibility
- Removed legacy function calls.
- Bugfix: Count query for recipient groups.
- Add a key to temporary tables; makes tables joins far less expensive. - Fix for Symphony 2.3: Remove Lang::activate()
- Bugfix (#51) - More fixes for Symphony 2.3
- Fixed 2.3 compatibility
- Bugfix: Advanced Recipient Group filtering (chaining DSs, DS param output).
- Bugfix: Using the ENM field's parameter output breaks pages and ETM layouts if there is no sender.
